action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Reserve Component DD-214 Act of 2019
This bill requires that the final pay and certificate of discharge or release from active status for a reserve member of the Armed Forces be ready for delivery when the reserve member is released from duty.
